ComicInfo.Summary:
THE ULTIMATE HUNTING PRESERVE: WAKANDA!
Yautja stalk the jungles of one of the most isolated - and wealthy - nations on Earth. Wakanda's War Dogs, the Hatut Zeraze, fall like wheat. The Dora Milaje bury those bodies with their own. Princess Shuri is trapped out of reach. And the Black Panther finds his country invaded not by the warmongering West - but by monsters from beyond the stars.
The fiercest hunters in the known universe - versus a king who might just be beast enough to stop them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-30 08:00:43. [CVDB1071606]
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Panther, Maji Kina, Okoye, Predator, Shuri
ComicInfo.Locations: Africa, Birnin Zana, Great Mound, Wakanda
